long_description: Burrow into the deep, curly fleece of the Patagonia Pelage Vest for women. It sports a shawl collar, offset front zipper and dropped hem in front. Warmth and fun in one! Curly polyester fleece is soft and cozy; recycled-polyester lining has a Durable Water Repellent finish. Sassy, doubled-fleece shawl collar protects against chill. Asymmetric zipper adds interest and provides a contoured fit. Deep handwarmer pockets keep your digits snug. Patagonia women's Pelage vest features a longer length in front that layers well.
short_description: Burrow into the deep, curly fleece of the Patagonia Pelage Vest for women. It sports a shawl collar, offset front zipper and dropped hem in front. Warmth and fun in one!
